articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Winter River-Crossing Attack Drill
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Winter River-Crossing Attack Drill
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- A winter river-crossing attack drill of the armored infantry sub-units of the motorized strike group in the western sector of the front of the Korean People's Army (KPA) was staged at the initiative of KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 He organized and guided the drill.
					
					 He was greeted at the drill ground by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Army General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Army General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, and other commanding officers of the KPA.
					
					 After receiving a report on the schemes of the KPA forces and "enemy" forces at the observation post, he ordered the start of the drill.
					
					 After self-propelled artillery pieces of the motorized strike group pounded in succession the bases of the "enemies" with a Juche-oriented artillery fire striking method, combatants mounted a bold attack and advance troops crossed the frozen part of the river unimagined by the "enemies" and wiped out "those enemy forces" who were desperately defending an islet on the river and put the defence lines under control in a twinkle.
					
					 Then sub-units ensuring the advance successfully helped sub-units of the motorized strike group cross the river by using various kinds of river-crossing means including floating bridge.
					
					 Hwang Pyong So and Hyon Yong Chol commanded the river-crossing operation on an advance armored car and a self-propelled artillery piece.
					
					 The commanding officers of the KPA should take the lead in the charge and the battle for crushing the enemies just as those of the guerilla army did, Kim Jong Un said, adding that their order "Follow me!" should resound forth loudly  in the  combat drill grounds.
					
					 He stressed that the KPA should study hard the combat and training methods suited to the features of the theatres for military actions in Korea irrespective of rainy or winter seasons in the future, too, so that all units and sub-units may acquire capabilities to fight actual battles to cross rivers and mountains at a breath.
					
					 At the end of the winter-river crossing offensive drill of the above-said sub- units, he pointed out merits and demerits manifested in the drill. Underscoring the weighty significance of the drill in carrying out the party's military strategic policy, he instructed the KPA to frequently organize the similar drill in the future. 
					
					 Noting that a powerful offensive means rock-firm defence, he said only when the KPA is capable of mounting a deadly attack, can it prevent the enemies from behaving flippantly in its eyes on the forefront.
					
					 He said that the KPA should prepare all soldiers as a match-for-a hundred fighters capable of fighting actual battles by making their training more intensive just as the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu, and should keep itself highly alerted so that it may mercilessly wipe out the aggressors, should they dare make a preemptive attack on the inviolable land of the DPRK, and successfully carry forward the tradition of victory in the confrontation with the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Monday sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter, expressing deep condolences over her death.

articles.title: DPRK Marathoners Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Marathoners Back Home
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK marathoner Kim Hye Gyong returned home on Tuesday after coming first at the 15th Asian Marathon Championship and the 2015 Hong Kong Marathon.
					 Also returning home were DPRK marathoners Pak Chol and Kim Mi Gyong who came second respectively at the 15th Asian Marathon Championship.
					
					 They were greeted by officials concerned and players at Pyongyang Railway Station.
					
					 The coach and marathoners laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: C.C., Youth League Meets
articles.content:
C.C., Youth League Meets
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- An enlarged meeting of the 55th Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League took place here on Tuesday.
					 The meeting discussed the issue of implementing to the letter the important tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for Juche 104 (2015).
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the New Year address served as a banner giving the conviction of the bright future of the powerful Paektusan nation and an important guideline as it clearly indicated the tasks and ways of glorifying this significant year as a year of the great victory, a year of revolutionary, auspicious events.
					
					 They underscored the need for the youth league organizations to channel their efforts into the work of the youth league to further increase the invincible might of the socialist political and ideological power in hearty response to the New Year address.
					
					 They said that the officials of the youth league and school youth and children should devote themselves to the work to hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem with loyalty and successfully spruce up the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun as the eternal sacred temple of the sun and devotedly defend it.
					
					 They stressed the need to successfully discharge the honorable mission and duty as the young vanguard in the era of Songun in the on-going general offensive toward the grand festival of significant October, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The meeting was attended by members of the C.C., the youth league and its officials in Pyongyang and local areas.

articles.title: C.C., GFTUK Meets
articles.content:
C.C., GFTUK Meets
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- An enlarged meeting of the 77th Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) took place here on Tuesday. 
					 The meeting discussed the issue of implementing to the letter the important tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for Juche 104 (2015).
					
					 Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers underscored the need to dynamically advance towards the grand festival of October, holding high the militant slogan "Let us all turn out in the general offensive to hasten final victory in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu!" put up by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The trade union organizations should take the education in the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Il's patriotism, faith, anti-imperialist and class consciousness and morality as the main tasks of ideological education, they noted.
					
					 They stressed the need to make positive contributions to glorifying this significant year as a year of great victories and revolutionary, auspicious events.
					
					 The meeting was attended by members and alternate members of the C.C., the GFTUK and its officials in Pyongyang and local areas.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Geology Held
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Geology Held
 Phyongsong, January 27 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation in the field of geology took place in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province on Monday and Tuesday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the  General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers and field officials of different units, including the Ministry of State Natural Resources Development, Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Sariwon University of Geology, Phyongsong University of Coal Mining and the Geological Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 The presentation was divided into the mineral prospecting and geological composition and information panels. Its participants heard more than 150 valuable papers.
					
					 During the presentation lectures were given to introduce world trend in the field of geology and the theory of geological prospecting in Korea and its development.
					
					 There were introduction of books including "Series of Korean Geology" (ten volumes) and brisk exchange of multi-media.

articles.title: Six-Year-Old Music Prodigy
articles.content:
Six-Year-Old Music Prodigy
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- O Yun Jong is a six-year-old girl who is studying at the early music class of the Taedongmun Kindergarten in Pyongyang, which is well known throughout the country for having produced a number of music prodigies.
					 She began violin two years ago, but her performance skill is very admirable at present. She is now capable of composing songs.
					
					 The kindergarten recently brought out a collection of her songs under the title "We Grow Up under Loving Care of Marshal Kim Jong Un".

articles.title: US, Worst Human Rights Abuser: Papers of DPRK
articles.content:
US, Worst Human Rights Abuser: Papers of DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- It has recently been disclosed that a police unit in Miami City, Florida used photos of black men as targets of their shooting drills.
					 There are many countries in the world but there is no such a country as the U.S. where policemen claiming abiding by laws openly conducted shooting drills targeting photos of black men who are alive, the DPRK's leading papers say in their commentaries on Tuesday.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 This shocking fact again clearly proved that the U.S. is the worst tundra of human rights with serious racial contradiction where misanthropy and indiscriminate killings are rampant.
					
					 The U.S., which has turned its land into a theater of human rights abuses, is making no scruple of perpetrating human rights abuses in other countries.
					
					 What matters is the fact that the U.S. is behaving so ridiculously as to take issue with other countries over their "human rights issues" while shelving its own drawback.
					
					 The U.S. has accused other countries of their "human rights records" and politicized and internationalized them. This is aimed to calm down the world public criticism focused on its base human rights abuses, interfere in internal affairs of other countries and justify its domination over them.
					
					 It is a serious lesson taught by history that the U.S. "human rights" racket is always followed by its interference in internal affairs of others and invasion of them.
					
					 Minju Joson says the above-said fact brought to light what extreme phase racism has reached in the U.S., adding serious racial discrimination is an inveterate evil practice in the U.S. society.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Creation of Staff of US-S. Korea Combined Division
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Creation of Staff of US-S. Korea Combined Division
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The United States and the south Korean military set up the staff of the U.S.-south Korea combined division and put it into full operation.
					 The staff will reportedly perform special missions such as disabling the DPRK's nukes and missiles and carrying out "special civil operations in the north" in contingency.
					
					 This is an extremely dangerous provocation as it is aimed at souring the atmosphere of dialogue now being created with much effort thanks to the positive proposals of the DPRK for defusing the danger of a nuclear war and de-escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula with a horror-ridden war atmosphere. 
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the DPRK to defuse the danger of war, ease the tension and create a peaceful climate on the peninsula and thus bring about a great change in the north-south relations.
					
					 This year the DPRK put forward a series of crucial proposals for achieving detente on the peninsula and opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification such as demanding a moratorium on the joint military exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities.
					
					 These proposals have drawn positive support and response from public at home and abroad as they reflect not only the requirements of the times for peace and stability in Korea still remaining  divided on the earth but all Koreans' desire for a free and peaceful life in a reunified country.
					
					 It was against this backdrop that the U.S. created the war staff, the first of its kind in the world, and put it into operation after slapping "additional sanctions" against the DPRK from the outset of the year. 
					
					 The above-said staff is like a unit for steering the moves for a new war on the peninsula and a political and military terrorist mechanism to bring down the inviolable political system in the DPRK.
					
					 This is clear from the fact that the staff was created with the 2nd division of the U.S. forces, the main force of the U.S. troops in south Korea, as its backbone and all units of the division and a motorized brigade of the south Korean army are to rapidly operate under it and participate in a war in contingency.
					
					 The dangerous nature of the staff is also proved by its mission and operations to launch preemptive attacks on the DPRK, totally disable the DPRK's armed forces for self-defence including nuclear deterrence and carry out "civil operations" in it. 
					
					 The U.S. is mulling getting familiar and rounding off "scenarios for eliminating nukes and WMDs from the north and carrying out civil operations" through military drills such as the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle planned to stage together with the south Korean warmongers from early in March.
					
					 The large-scale joint war games ceaselessly staged in south Korea every year are the root cause of escalating tension on the Korean peninsula and bringing the danger of nuclear war to the Korean nation. But the U.S. moves to increase the function and role of the above-said war staff through saber-rattling are as dangerous an act as inviting disaster. 
					
					 Lurking behind the creation of this war staff is a sinister scenario to hurl the south Korean army as cannon fodder for igniting a new war on the peninsula at any cost. 
					
					 The inclusion of officers of the south Korean army in the staff is nothing but sophism and a height of hypocrisy to mislead the world public.
					
					 We would like to ask what role the officers of the south Korean army can play in the staff as its military sovereignty is entirely in the hands of the U.S. Needles to say, the U.S. forces have real power in the staff. This once again proves that the south Korean army is no more than a bullet shield for the U.S. forces when a war is launched against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. inaugurated the staff on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the "mutual defence pact", humiliating and traitorous war agreement it concluded by instigating the south Korean authorities. This is a vivid expression of the warmongers' scenario to keep south Korea under their permanent occupation and put the whole of Korea under their control.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal disturbing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and an aggressor and a provoker.

articles.title: S. Korean Public Protests against Decision to Dissolve Progressive Political Party
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Protests against Decision to Dissolve Progressive Political Party
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Human Rights Center of the south Korean Council of Christian Churches on Jan. 24 released a statement condemning the injustice of the decision made by the "constitutional court" to disorganize the Unified Progressive Party (UPP), according to the south Korean CBS.
					 The statement recalled that the Supreme Court at a trial of Ri Sok Gi, former lawmaker from the party, clarified that the "underground revolutionary organization" did not exist and that there was no suspicion of the attempted rebellion.
					
					 This brought to light the facts that all evidence produced by the "constitutional court" as the reason for disbanding the party in December last year was groundless and the decision to dissolve it was obviously the politically-motivated ruling, it added.
					
					 Meanwhile, former lawmakers from UPP held a press conference outside the "constitutional court" on January 23 at which they held that it lost the reason for disbanding the party, according to the south Korean KBS.
					
					 Members of civic and social bodies such as the Solidarity for Progress have staged actions for the release of Ri in Seoul since Jan. 22.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Calls for Opening Up Broad Avenue to Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Calls for Opening Up Broad Avenue to Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification issued a statement on Jan. 22.
					 The statement fully supported the appeal adopted at a joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK to carry out the part dealing with Korea's reunification advanced by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					
					 It called upon all Koreans to turn out in the struggle to reject foreign forces and hew out the road of independent reunification in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Any Korean should clearly see through the reality, turn out in the efforts to create an atmosphere favorable for improving inter-Korean relations and resolutely check the moves of a handful of anti-reunification elements, it said, adding:
					
					 It is necessary to hold brisk dialogue and negotiations substantially conducive to mending inter-Korean relations and reunifying the country and write a new history of inter-Korean relations.
					
					 All Koreans should lift voices calling upon the political parties and organizations in the south to join the giant trend of history to bring about a fundamental change in the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Koreans in US Demand Probe into Truth about Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
Koreans in US Demand Probe into Truth about Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held a meeting before the head office of the New York Times on Jan. 18 demanding a probe into the truth about ferry Sewol disaster, according to Minjok Thongsin, the internet paper of Koreans in the U.S.
					 Speakers said although a special law on the ferry disaster was enacted, there is not slightest sign of moves to probe the truth behind the disaster. 
					
					 It is painful to note that the members of the special committee for probing the truth about the disaster set up under the special law include a fewer persons keen to probe the truth than those politicians not earnest to do so, they deplored. 
					
					 They expressed their will to stage unflinching actions for the probe.

articles.title: Koreans in China Call for Raising Hot Wind of Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in China Call for Raising Hot Wind of Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China on Jan. 23 issued a statement titled "Let the whole nation join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification".
					 The slogans and crucial proposals for Korea's reunification clarified by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year address serve as important guidelines comprehensively indicating the most correct orientation and ways for improving the deteriorated inter-Korean relations and providing an epochal phase of independent reunification, and powerful treasured sword of certain victory that the entire nation should firmly hold fast to in the sacred patriotic struggle for reunification, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 The general association and all Koreans in China will raise a hot wind of independent reunification in the idea of By Our Nation Itself in hearty response to the call of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations to carry out the tasks of Korea's reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year address and thus greet the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation as the grand festival of the nation which will shine forever in the history of the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Respond to DPRK's Patriotic Call
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Respond to DPRK's Patriotic Call
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Ri Chae Son, vice-chairman of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia made public a statement on Jan. 22 in support of the appeal to all Koreans adopted at a joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 The statement fully supported the appeal, expressing the will to wage a more dynamic, patriotic movement for reunification to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification this year.
					
					 It is a disgrace for the Korean nation that it has suffered unspeakable misfortune and pain as it is not yet free from the tragedy of division that has lasted for seven decades due to the U.S. imperialists, the statement said.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should make a bold decision at an early date to take the road of improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving independent reunification, peace and prosperity, away from the conception of confrontation of social systems which will only escalate confrontation and bring war, it stressed.
					
					 It demanded the south Korean authorities stop large-scale joint military exercises with foreign forces that hurt the inter-Korean relations, and make positive contact and exchange between the north and the south and thus fully respond to the DPRK's call for making this year a historic year when peace settles on the Korean peninsula free from war games.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan formed a preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il as a holiday common to humankind on January 20.
					 Ju Yong Il, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a seminar, photo exhibition, art performance and other colorful events praising the revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed at the "Jongilbong" Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Ulyanovsk Region on Jan. 21.
					 Aleksandr Kruglikov, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from Jan. 21 to Feb. 20 and decided to organize political and cultural events praising the exploits of Kim Jong Il during the period.

articles.title: Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Cambodia
articles.content:
Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Cambodia on Jan. 21.
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee on the instruction of King Norodom Sihamoni.
					
					 The preparatory committee set the period for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star from Jan. 22 to Feb. 21 and the period for celebrating the Day of the Sun from Apr. 1 to 30 and decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the feats performed by them in developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and organize colorful political and cultural events during the periods.

articles.title: Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in India
articles.content:
Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in India
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il  was inaugurated in India on Jan. 21.
					 The general secretary of the Indian National Congress Party who is a lawmaker was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize political and cultural events including meeting, seminar, lecture, photo exhibition and film show at political parties, social organizations, friendship and solidarity organizations with the Korean people and Juche idea study groups in India from Jan. 22 and Apr. 25 in praise of the revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Proposal Supported by Angolan, Italian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Proposal Supported by Angolan, Italian Personages
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Personages of Angola and Italy made public statements in support of the proposal for Korea's reunification made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					 The acting chairman of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples said on Jan. 13:
					
					 Respected HE Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, in his New Year address offered a crucial proposal for solving the issue of national reunification, the greatest desire of the nation, by achieving the great national unity in the idea of By the Korean Nation Itself, calling for opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the whole nation.
					
					 He clarified that the north and the south of Korea should smoothly settle the issue of national reunification in the common interests of the nation, underscoring the need to remove the danger of a war and create a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula. This is the practical and fair proposal which helps put an end to the tragedy of division and reunify the country.
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to reunify the country, supporting his proposal for Korea's reunification.
					
					 Alessandro Mustillo, national coordinator of the Communist Youth Front of Italy, said on Jan. 10:
					
					 I positively support the DPRK's peace policy clarified by Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					
					 We supporting socialist Korea urge the U.S. to lift at once all its political and economic sanctions against the DPRK, including recent "new sanctions", condemning its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We will wage dynamic political activities to disclose the absurdity of the imperialist propaganda being made by the U.S. and the West every day and introduce the real picture of the DPRK.

articles.title: New Year Address Supported by Czech Organization, Thai Personage
articles.content:
New Year Address Supported by Czech Organization, Thai Personage
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on Jan. 16 in support of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address.
					 The statement quoted Kim Jong Un as saying in his address that it is necessary to remove the danger of a war, ease the tension and create a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop all war exercises with foreign forces and the U.S., the very one that divided the Korean nation into two and has imposed the suffering of national division upon them for seventy years, should desist from pursuing anachronistic policy hostile towards the DPRK and boldly make a policy switch.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Un will win the final victory and achieve Korea's reunification, the life-time desire of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, without fail.
					
					 Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, in a statement on Jan. 21 said that Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, made public his New Year address calling upon all the Korean people to turn out in the general offensive for hastening the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would register fresh successes in their struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country by successfully implementing the tasks advanced by Kim Jong Un in his New Year address under his leadership.

articles.title: Swedish Organization Issues Magazine Korea Information
articles.content:
Swedish Organization Issues Magazine Korea Information
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association issued its magazine Korea Information on Jan. 19.
					 The magazine carried articles titled "Political parties and organizations of Nordic countries pay tribute to leader Kim Jong Il", "Human rights in the DPRK", "Exaggerated and fake testimonies" and "Misinformation under criticism", illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un making his New Year address.
					
					 It conveyed the news that a joint memorial meeting of political parties and organizations of Nordic countries took place in Stockholm, Sweden on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Referring to the fact that recently the DPRK have registered big successes, it stressed that all of them are the brilliant fruition of the vitality of the Songun politics and its might.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. production of an undesirable film slinging mud at the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and abetting terrorism is a typical example of hostile acts against the DPRK, it said the real intention sought by the U.S. in applying "additional sanctions" against the DPRK over the cyber attack on the movie manufacturer is to divert elsewhere public attention focused on it inside and outside the country following the recent disclosure of tortures by the CIA.
					
					 The magazine disclosed the falsity of the reports being aired by south Korean and Western media against the DPRK and called for having a proper view of it.

articles.title: British Organizations Denounce S. Koreas' Suppression of Progressive Forces
articles.content:
British Organizations Denounce S. Koreas' Suppression of Progressive Forces
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on January 15 to denounce the south Korean authorities' suppression of the progressive forces.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Hwang Son, a progressive activist of south Korea, was arrested on charges of violation of the "Security Law" for the reason that she praised the DPRK. This is, in fact, an unprecedented fascist violation aimed to stifle the freedom of thought and expression.
					
					 Now fascist politically-motivated terrorist acts have become frequent occurrences in south Korea.
					
					 The brutal fascist acts including the arrest of Hwang Son clearly show that the "liberal democracy" touted by the authorities is a sheer lie.
					
					 The "liberal democracy" is fascism, not genuine democracy and "unification under the liberal democracy" trumpeted about by them is "unification of social systems" in the true sense of the word.
					
					 South Korea is like a big fascist concentration camp.
					
					 The world progressive people should disclose and condemn the fascist suppression by the south Korean authorities and miserable human rights situation there.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities release progressive and patriotic people including Hwang Son at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The January issue of the Romanian paper Romania Muncitoare carried the gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction."
					 The work, made public on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that preserving the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction is the basic principle to be adhered to in accomplishing the socialist cause. It also indicates tasks and ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicio de subunidades de infanteria blindada
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicio de subunidades de infanteria blindada
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ACNC) -- Por la iniciativa personal del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, tuvo lugar el entrenamiento de cruce del rio y ataque en la estacion invernal de las subunidades de infanteria blindada del colectivo de ataque motorizado del frente occidental del EPC.
					Lo organizo y lo dirigio el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					Le recibieron en el campo de ejercicio el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de las fuerzas terrestres Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Gil, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, y otros comandantes del EPC.
					
					Tras recibir en el puesto de vigilancia el parte sobre las intenciones de las tropas nuestras y de las "enemigas", el Mariscal dio la orden de iniciar el entrenamiento.
					
					Los canones autopropulsados del colectivo arriba mencionado abrieron un fuego intensivo contra las bases "enemigas" usando autoctonos metodos de ataque artillero. 
					
					Seguidamente, los combatientes procedieron al asalto intrepido y las tropas de avanzada cruzaron el rio sobre el hielo por los puntos inimaginables por los "enemigos", que defendian desesperadamente un islote, y tomaron en un instante las zonas de defensa tras aniquilarlos.
					
					A continuacion, las subunidades encargadas de avance aseguraron con exito el cruce de las subunidades del colectivo usando los equipos de cruce de varios tipos como puente flotante.
					
					Hwang Pyong So y Hyon Yong Chol dirigieron el ejercicio de cruce a bordo del carro blindado y el canon autopropulsado que marchaban al frente.
					
					Kim Jong Un dijo que los oficiales de nuestro ejercito revolucionario deben ponerse en la primera linea de ataque y de batalla de aniquilacion de enemigos al igual que los comandantes de la guerrilla antijaponesa. Anadio que en los campos de entrenamiento se debe repercutir en alto la orden de comandantes de "!Siganme!".
					
					El EPC debe estudiar constantemente en todas las estaciones del ano, incluso la temporada de muchas lluvias y el invierno, los metodos de combate y ejercicio convenientes a las caracteristicas de las zonas de operacion militar de nuestro pais, senalo.
					
					Prosiguio que todas las unidades y subunidades del EPC deben adquirir la capacidad de combate real con que puedan superar de un tiron los rios y las zonas montanosas que haya en el trayecto de avance.
					
					Finalizado el entrenamiento, el Mariscal evaluo e indico lo bueno y lo malo del ejercicio. 
					
					Apuntando que el ejercicio de hoy tiene mucha importancia en la materializacion de la orientacion militar-estrategica del partido, instruyo organizar con frecuencia las maniobras de ese tipo en el EPC.
					
					La ofensiva fuerte implica la defensa inexpugnable, enseno y prosiguio que los enemigos no podran actuar con frivolidad ante nuestra vista en la primera linea del frente avanzado cuando el EPC tenga la capacidad de ataque terrible.
					
					Destaco que si los enemigos se atreven a abrir primero el fuego contra el sagrado territorio patrio, el EPC debe exterminarlos implacablemente y continuar firmemente la tradicion de victorias en la confrontacion antiyanqui, al formar a todos los uniformados como combatientes capaces de pelear a solas contra cien enemigos y mantenerlos en el perfecto estado de movilizacion levantando la oleada de ejercicios por el estilo de la guerrilla antijaponesa del monte Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunta Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunta Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 26 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de la difunta Kim Jong Suk, combatiente revolucionaria antijaponesa, para expresar profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con representantes diplomaticos de paises miembros de ASEAN
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con representantes diplomaticos de paises miembros de ASEAN
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ACNC) -- El canciller de la RPDC Ri Su Yong departio la vispera con los representantes diplomaticos de los paises miembros de ASEAN en Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el embajador camboyano Op Sisawada, el embajador lao Kiettisak Keobanhdith, el embajador vietnamita Pham Viet Hung, el embajador indonesio Bambang Hiendrasto y el consejero de la embajada malaya Mohd Nor Azrin Bin Md Zain acreditados en Corea.
					
					El canciller coreano se refirio a la lucha de los militares y civiles de Corea levantados para materializar cabalmente las tareas programaticas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en su mensaje del ano nuevo.
					
					Informo detalladamente a los participantes los esfuerzos del gobierno de la RPDC por realizar las tareas para la reunificacion de la patria y la posicion de politica exterior aclaradas en el mensaje.
					
					En la charla se intercambiaron los criterios sobre algunos problemas de interes mutuo tales como el desarrollo de relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y los paises miembros de ASEAN.

articles.title: Periodicos revelan naturaleza criminal de EE.UU. como archi-violador de DDHH
articles.content:
Periodicos revelan naturaleza criminal de EE.UU. como archi-violador de DDHH
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, quedo revelado el hecho sorprendente de que en la ciudad de Miami de Florida, Estados Unidos, una unidad policiaca adiestro el tiro tomando como blanco las fotos de los negros vivos.
					En este mundo no existe otro pais como EE.UU. donde los policias encargados de la mision de defender la ley cometen tales crimenes.
					
					Asi condenan los periodicos en sus comentarios publicados el dia 27.
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun subraya que esto comprueba otra vez que EE.UU. es el infierno  donde la contradiccion racial llega a punto de explosion y reinan la misantropia y el asesinato indiscriminado.
					
					Tal pais encubre los casos domesticos de violacion de DDHH y acusa ridiculamente a otros paises de DDHH, critica el comentario y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. trata de politizar e internacionalizar los "problemas de DDHH" de otros paises para calmar la critica internacional sobre sus barbaridades de violacion de DDHH, intervenir en los asuntos internos de otros paises y justificar su dominio sobre estos paises.
					
					La historia dio una seria leccion de que la acusacion a otros paises de "DDHH" por parte de EE.UU. se acompana siempre con la injerencia en los asuntos internos y la agresion.
					
					A su vez, el rotativo Minju Joson senala que tales hechos facilitan conocer a cuan extremada etapa llego el racismo en Estados Unidos y revela que la discriminacion racial deviene la arraigada costumbre de la sociedad norteamericana.
